sentence.Network_en: Their health-care system suffers from queues, shortages and ropey equipment.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的医疗体系有很多不足：要排队等候，资源短缺，设备陈旧。

entry.tran: 差劲的;劣质的;差强人意的
entry.def: If you say that something is ropey, you mean that its quality is poor or unsatisfactory.

example.ex: Their health-care system suffers from queues, shortages and ropey equipment.
example.tran: 他们的医疗体系有很多不足：要排队等候，资源短缺，设备陈旧。

auth_sentence.content: We had planned to meet that afternoon but, feeling "ropey" and wanting to be on form, he invited me for dinner instead.

auth_sentence.content: It is still hard not to think of the Hitler diaries hoax when contemplating Hugh Trevor-Roper Private Eye's "Hugh Very-Ropey".
